comment: This " eventually " concept of wearing customers down through indifference and hoping they just give up and take poor treatment is why the gig / sharing economy is fundamentally flawed . I know it's just your shitty house or car , but I'm still giving you $ $ $ . <URL>

comment: The property we were greeted by was a dilapidated shack , each floor more dangerous and disgusting than the next . We never felt safe , we barely slept , and for our troubles we were harassed with threats from the hosts and evicted on New Year s Eve . <URL>
